description: This file contains helper functions for the game logic of a Tic Tac Toe web game.

methods.name: calculateNextMove
methods.description: Calculates the next move in the game based on the current state of the board. This function is a placeholder for potential AI implementation.

methods.name: validateMove
methods.description: Validates a move based on its position and the current state of the board, ensuring it's within bounds and the position is not already occupied.
